ingredients.ingredient: 1 ear corn on the cob, unhusked

cookingTips: Microwaving corn in the husk makes shucking easier as steam loosens the silk
Let corn cool slightly before handling to avoid burns
Pull silk away from the tip end for cleanest removal
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This method uses heat to make shucking easier. Are you familiar with the microwave trick for corn, or would you like guidance on the best technique?
